H0.text: Name the last US president to meet the leader of Cuba before Barack Obama did in 2015. Jimmy Carter

H1.text: Name the last US president to meet the leader of Cuba before Barack Obama did in 2015. Bill Clinton

H2.text: Name the last US president to meet the leader of Cuba before Barack Obama did in 2015. Gerald Ford

H3.text: Name the last US president to meet the leader of Cuba before Barack Obama did in 2015. Eisehower

A4.text: In January 1999, U.S. President Bill Clinton eased travel restrictions to Cuba in an effort to increase cultural exchanges between the two nations.

A5.text: At the United Nations Millennium Summit in September 2000, Castro and Clinton spoke briefly at a group photo session and shook hands.
